data.text:
@UKHSA Interesting to note that there is no mention of testing.
I guess the intention is to stop recording instances of covid infection, if this graphic is correct.
@UKHSA Remove mandates yes, and then remove WEF members
@UKHSA Thank you but I don't need any advice from any of you when it comes to protecting myself from covid-19.
@UKHSA lol. Consumption of humble pie is going to be vomit inducing here over the coming 6 months.
@UKHSA China hide the truth and spread the virus since 2019

@UKHSA Our company urgently needs someone for translations jobs. We need German,Italian,Spanish,French,Spanish  natives for these projects.If interested kindly reach out our project manager via Telegram:Martini Albert. For your job offer. Thank you.

@UKHSA A classroom is a crowded enclosed and often poorly ventilated space.

Can you explain why your advice on face masks does not apply to schools?
